titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 620 Jacaranda Street in Lanai City, Hawaii, as the "Goro Hokama Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Mr. Miller (FL) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 132.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 413 - 0 (Roll no. 11).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2679-2680

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 2/7/2001--Passed House without amendment. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 620 Jacaranda Street in Lanai City, Hawaii, as the Goro Hokama Post Office Building.
